Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.reflection.property

Interface PropertyFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AllFields, ArchivedFields, ConversionPropertyFilterSet, NamedField, PropertyFilterSet
public interface PropertyFilter
A filter that determines how a Property field or method can be accessed.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
